Articles.Content:
Hi!

While playing the main storyline I encountered some strange bugs like:

- on starting a vehicle and after gravity turn while casting towards AP suddenly the vehicle flies off with great hyperspeed on an escaping course. (to counter this i could cheat into kerbins orbit, from that the game works normally)

- cheating/teleporting into an orbit works only on kerbin - not eg. duna or any other planet, while cheating to another planets surface works.

After that, I tested the same stuff within a new sandbox savegame and voila: no problems there.

So I assume that my savegame file just got corrupted somehow. I digged into it and learned a lot of that but of course manual editing is kinda time consuming and errors may happen.

 

Are there any tools out there to:

- validate / debug savegames

- merge vehicles into savegames

Any hint is highly appreciated!
